cnbc.title: The regulatory path ahead for a Netflix and Warner Bros. deal could get dicey
cnbc.summary: Regulatory questions are already rising about Netflix's deal to combine its business with WBD's streaming service HBO Max and film studio Warner Bros.

cnbc.title: David Ellison's hunt for WBD made David Zaslav richer — and it may not be over
cnbc.summary: Paramount is considering taking an offer to WBD shareholders, thinking its deal has a better chance of gaining regulatory approval than Netflix's, sources said.

cnbc.title: Supreme Court to hear case on Trump birthright citizenship order
cnbc.summary: The U.S. Constitution's 14th Amendment had been understood to grant citizenship to children born in the country, even if their parents are not citizens.

cnbc.title: Judge finalizes remedies in Google antitrust case
cnbc.summary: A U.S. judge on Friday finalized his decision for the consequences Google will face for its search monopoly ruling, adding new details to the decided remedies.

cnbc.title: RFK Jr.’s vaccine panel weakens recommendation on hepatitis B shot for babies, scrapping universal guidance
cnbc.summary: Some public health experts expressed concerns the recommendation could lead to an increase in hepatitis B infections in babies.

cnbc.title: Jan. 6 pipe bomb suspect Brian Cole confessed, said he supports Trump and has anarchist views: MS NOW
cnbc.summary: Cole spoke to the authorities for "more than four hours" after his arrest, the government told a judge during the suspect's initial court appearance.

cnbc.title: Meta acquiring AI wearable company Limitless
cnbc.summary: Meta has acquired the startup Limitless, which makes a small, artificial intelligence-powered pendant.

cnbc.title: $208 million wiped out: Yieldstreet investors rack up more losses as firm rebrands to Willow Wealth
cnbc.summary: Yieldstreet is attempting to move past a troubled track record by rebranding to Willow Wealth while customers reel from a still-unfolding collapse of its funds.

cnbc.title: Core inflation rate watched by Fed hit 2.8%, delayed September data shows, lower than expected
cnbc.summary: The delayed core personal consumption expenditures price index for September was expected to show a 2.9% annual increase.

cnbc.title: Netflix to buy Warner Bros. film and streaming assets in $72 billion deal
cnbc.summary: Netflix announced it's reached a deal to buy WBD, bringing a swift end to a dramatic bidding process that also involved Paramount Skydance and Comcast.
